20211010.review_text: Best sandwich, brisket on fresh baked bread.  Can't wait to go back and try everything on the menu!

20210325.review_text: Amazing food. Excellent service, unbelievable atmosphere!! Highly recommend!!!

20210226.review_text: Great place there is no words to describe the food, customer service excellent, I will come back 🙏🙏🤩🤩🤩

20210118.review_text: My waiter was the owner. He has an awesome energy. He was extremely polite. The food was amazing! I had the brisket sandwich with sweet potato fries. I’ll be back and bring friends 😊
